title: Sautéed Brussels Sprouts
summary: Sautéed Brussels Sprouts might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe makes 4 servings with 86 calories, 4g of protein, and 4g of fat each. For 86 cents per serving, this recipe covers 15% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Plenty of people made this recipe, and 193 would say it hit the spot. Head to the store and pick up brussels sprouts, kosher salt and ground pepper, garlic, and a few other things to make it today. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 99%, this dish is great. Try Sautéed Brussels Sprouts, Sautéed Brussels Sprouts, and Sauteed Brussels Sprouts for similar recipes.
